commit.message:
Add use of external docker auth credentials, abbility to build and push images to external docker registry (#328)

* unfortunately, everything in one commit

* fix typos, method naming, commented code

* add tenacity, loggers and rm unneded silent try:except blocks, commented code

* fix deps installation

* remove linters from test execution

* fix pre-commit config, run registry unit test on darvin os only

* ignore deprecation warning of google cloud SDK

* fix tests by adding pytest-asyncio support

* set dockerhub_auth_secret fixture to be session scoped

* enable retry

* fix linter

* fix image transfer test, ignore deprecation warnings

* fix pytest setup

* rm retry for cleanup

* try different CLI runner

* bump deps, updated deprecated neuro run commands, make cli_runner compatible with py36

* add changelog

* cleanup, display cli runner logs
